verses.english: Ta, Seen, Meem.
These are the verses of the clear Book.
verses.hausa: Waɗancan ãyõyin Littãfi ne bayyananne.

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
verses.hausa: Tsammãninka kai mai halakar da ranka ne, dõmin ba su kasance mũminai ba!

verses.arabic: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
verses.english: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
verses.hausa: Idan Mun so zã Mu saukar, a kansu, da wata ãyã daga sama, sai wuyõyinsu su yini sabõda ita sunã mãsu ƙasƙantar da kai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.english: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
verses.hausa: Kuma wata tunãtarwa ba ta jẽ musu ba, daga Mai rahama, sãbuwa, fãce sun kasance daga barinta sunã mãsu bijirẽwa.

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne, sun ƙaryata, to, lãbãran abin da suka kasance sunã yi na izgili da shi zã ya je musu.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.english: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
verses.hausa: Shin, ba su dũba ba zuwa ga ƙasa, da yawa Muka tsirar a cikinta, daga dukan nau'i mai kyau?

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mũminai ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai rahama.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da Ubangijinka Ya kirãyi Mũsã, "Ka je wa mutãnen nan azzãlumai.

verses.english: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
verses.hausa: "Mutãnen Fir'auna bã zã su yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna, nĩ inã tsõron su ƙaryata ni.

verses.arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
verses.english: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ƙirjĩna ya yi ƙunci kuma harshẽna bã zai saku ba sabõda haka ka aika zuwa ga Harũna.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.english: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
verses.hausa: "Kuma sunã da wani laifi a kaina, sabõda haka inã tsõron kada su kashe ni."

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.english: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kayya! Ku tafi, kũ biyu, da ÃyõyinMu. Lalle ne, Munã tãre da ku Munã Mãsu saurãre."

verses.arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
verses.hausa: "Sai ku je wa Fir'auna, sa'an nan ku ce, Lalle ne, mu, Manzannin Ubangijin halitta ne."

verses.english: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
verses.hausa: "Ka saki Banĩ Isrã'ila tãre da mu."

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Shin, ba mu yi rẽnonka ba a cikinmu kanã jãrĩri, kuma ka zauna a cikinmu shẽkarudaga lõkacin rãyuwarka?"

verses.arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ka aikata aikinka wanda ka aikata alhãli kai kanã daga butulai?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.english: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Na aikata shi a lõkacin inã daga mãsu jãhilcin hushi."

verses.arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.english: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka na gudu daga gãre ku a lõkacin da na ji tsõronku, sai Ubangijĩna Ya bã ni hukunci, kuma Ya sanya ni daga Manzanni."

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.english: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"
verses.hausa: "Kuma waccan ni'ima ce, kanã gõrint a kaina, dõmin kã bautar da Banĩ Isrã'ĩla."

verses.english: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"
verses.hausa: Fir'auna ya ce: "Kuma mene ne Ubangijin halittu?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.english: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu, idan kun kasance mãsu ƙarfin ĩmãni."

verses.english: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce wa waɗanda suke a gẽfensa, "Bã za ku saurãra ba?"

verses.english: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku na farko."

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne Manzonku, wanda aka aiko zuwa gare ku, haƙi ƙa, mahaukaci ne."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ubangijin mafitar rãnã da maɓũyarta da abin dayake a tsakaninsu, idan kun kasance kunã hankalta."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne idan ka riƙi wani abin bautãwa wanĩna haƙĩƙa, inã sanyã ka daga ɗaurarru."

verses.english: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ashe, kuma kõ dã nã zõ maka da wani, abu mai bayyanãwa?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "To, ka zõ da shi idan ka kasance daga, mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.
verses.hausa: Sai ya jẽfa sandarsa, sai ga ta kumurci bayyananne.

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.english: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.
verses.hausa: Kuma ya fizge hannunsa, sai ga shi fari ga mãsu kallo.

verses.arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
verses.hausa: (Fir'auna) ya ce ga mashãwarta a gẽfensa, "Lalle ne, wannan haƙĩƙa, masihirci ne, mai ilmi!

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.english: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"
verses.hausa: "Yanã son ya fitar da ku daga ƙasarku game da sihirinSa. To mẽne ne kuke shãwartãwa?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ka jinkirtar da shi, shĩ da ɗan'uwansa, kuma ka aika mãsu gayya a cikin birãne."

verses.english: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."
verses.hausa: "Zã su zõ maka da dukkan mai yawan sihiri masani."

verses.english: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.
verses.hausa: Sai aka tãra masihirta dõmin ajalin yini sananne.

verses.english: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ce wa mutãne "Kõ kũ mãsu tãruwã ne?

verses.arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.english: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"
verses.hausa: "Tsammãninmu mu bi masihirta, idan sun kasance sũ ne marinjãya."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.english: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da masihirta suka jẽ suka ce wa Fir'auna,"Shin, lalle ne, haƙĩƙa munã da ijãra idan mun kasance mũ ne marinjãya?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.english: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Na'am! Kuma lalle ne, kũ ne a lõkacin haƙĩƙa muƙarrabai."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.english: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
verses.hausa: Mũsã ya ce musu, "Ku jẽfa abin da kuke mãsu jẽfãwa."

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.english: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
verses.hausa: Sai suka jẽfa igiyõyinsu, da sandunansu, kuma suka ce: "Da ƙarfin Fir'auna lalle ne mũ, haƙĩƙa, mũ ne marinjãya."

verses.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.english: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.
verses.hausa: Sai Mũsa ya jẽfa sandarsa, sai ga ta tanã harhaɗe abin da suke yi na ƙarya.

verses.english: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Sai aka jẽfar da masihirta sunã mãsu sujada.

verses.english: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni da Ubangijin halitta."

verses.english: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
verses.hausa: "Ubangijin Mũsa da Hãrũna."

verses.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ashe, kun yi ĩmãni sabõda shĩ, a gabãnin in yi muku izni? Lalle ne shi, haƙĩƙa babbanku ne wanda ya kõya muku sihirin, to, zã ku sani. Lalle ne haƙĩƙa, zan kakkãtse hannuwanku da kafãfunku a tarnaƙi, kuma haƙĩƙa, zan tsĩrẽ ku gabã ɗaya."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.english: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Bãbu wata cũta! Lalle ne mũ mãsu jũyãwa ne zuwa ga Ubangijinmu."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne mu munã kwaɗayin Ubangijinmu, Ya gãfarta mana kurakuranmu dõmin mun kasance farkon mãsu ĩmãni."

verses.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.english: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka aika zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa ka yi tafiyar dare da bãyiNa, lalle ne kũ waɗanda ake biyã ne.

verses.english: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
verses.hausa: Sai Fir'auna ya aika mãsu gayya a cikin birãne.

verses.english: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, waɗannan, haƙĩƙa, ƙungiya ce kaɗan."

verses.english: And indeed, they are enraging us,
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne sũ, a gare Mu, Mãsu fusãtarwa ne."

verses.english: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne mũ haƙĩƙa gabã ɗaya mãsu sauna ne."

verses.english: So We removed them from gardens and springs
verses.hausa: Sai Muka fitar da su daga gonaki da marẽmari.

verses.english: And treasures and honorable station -
verses.hausa: Da taskõki da mazauni mai kyau.

verses.english: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
verses.hausa: Kamar haka! Kuma Muka gãdar da su ga Banĩ Isrãĩla.

verses.english: So they pursued them at sunrise.
verses.hausa: Sai suka bĩ su sunã mãsu fita a lõkacin hũdõwar rãnã.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.english: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da jama'a biyu suka ga jũna, sai abõkan Mũsã suka ce: "Lalle ne mũ haƙĩ ƙa, waɗanda ake riska ne."

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.english: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kayya! Lalle ne Ubangijina Yanã tare da ni, zai shiryar da ni."

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.english: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka yi wahayi zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa "Ka dõki tẽku da sandarka." Sai tẽku ta tsãge, kõwane tsãgi ya kasance kamar falalen dũtse mai girma.

verses.english: And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka kusantar da waɗansu mutãne a can.

verses.english: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka tsĩrar da Mũsã da waɗanda suke tãre da shi gabã ɗaya.

verses.english: Then We drowned the others.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka nutsar da waɗansu mutãnen.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka, kaƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabũwayi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: And recite to them the news of Abraham,
verses.hausa: Kuma ka karanta, a kansu, lãbãrin Ibrãhĩm.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
verses.hausa: A sã'ilin da ya ce wa ubansa da mutãnensa, "Mẽne ne kuke bauta wa?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
verses.english: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Munã bauta wa gumãka, sabõda haka munã yini mãsu lazimta a gare su."

verses.english: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Shin, sunã jin ku, a lõkacin da kuke kira?"

verses.english: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
verses.hausa: "Kõ kuwa sunã amfãnin ku, kõ sunã cũtar ku?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ã'a mun sãmĩ ubanninmu, kamar haka ne suke aikatãwa."

verses.english: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Shin to, kun ga abin da kuka kasance kunã bautã wa?"

verses.english: You and your ancient forefathers?
verses.hausa: "Kũ da ubanninku mafi daɗẽwa?"

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,
verses.hausa: "To lalle ne, sũ maƙiya ne a gare ni, fãce Ubangijin halittu."

verses.english: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
verses.hausa: "Wanda Ya halitta ni, sa'an nan Yanã shiryar da ni."

verses.english: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
verses.hausa: "Kuma Wanda Yake Shĩ ne Yake ciyar da ni, kuma Yanã shãyar da ni."

verses.english: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
verses.hausa: "Kuma idan na yi jiyya, to, Shĩ ne Yake warkar da ni."

verses.english: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
verses.hausa: "Kuma wanda Yake matar da ni, sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ni."

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.english: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."
verses.hausa: "Kuma wanda Yake inã kwaɗayin Ya gãfarta mini kurãkuraina, a rãnar sãkamako."

verses.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.
verses.hausa: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka ba ni hukunci, kuma Ka riskar da ni ga sãlihai."

verses.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.english: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
verses.hausa: "Kuma Ka sanya mini harshen gaskiya a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe."

verses.english: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
verses.hausa: "Kuma Ka sanya ni daga magãdan Aljannar ni'ima."

verses.arabic: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.english: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
verses.hausa: "Kuma Ka gãfarta wa ubãna, lalle ne shi, ya kasance daga ɓatattu."

verses.english: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
verses.hausa: "Kuma kada Ka kunyata ni a rãnar da ake tãyar da su."

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.english: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children
verses.hausa: "A rãnar da dũkiya bã ta amfãni, kuma ɗiya bã su yi."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.english: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
verses.hausa: "Fãce wanda ya jẽ wa Allah da zũciya mai tsarki."

verses.english: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka kusantar da Aljanna ga mãsu taƙawa.

verses.english: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
verses.hausa: Kuma aka fitar da wutã babba dõmin halakakku.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ce musu, "Inã abin da kuka kasance kunã bautawa?"

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.english: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"
verses.hausa: "Baicin Allah? Shin sunã tamakon ku kõ kuwa sunã tsare kansu?"

verses.english: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
verses.hausa: Sai aka kikkife su a cikinta, su da halakakkun.

verses.english: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
verses.hausa: Da rundunar Ibilĩsa gabã ɗaya.

verses.english: They will say while they dispute therein,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: alhãli sunã a cikinta sunã yin husũma,

verses.arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
verses.hausa: "Rantsuwa da Allah! Lalle ne mun kasance, haƙĩƙa, a cikin ɓata bayyananna."

verses.english: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "A lõkacin da muke daidaita ku da Ubangijin halittu.

verses.english: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bãbu abin da ya ɓatar da mu fãce mãsu laifi."

verses.english: So now we have no intercessors
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka bã mu da waɗansu macẽta."

verses.english: And not a devoted friend.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã mu da abõki, masõyi."

verses.arabic: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka dã lalle munã da (dãmar) kõmawa, dõmin mu kasance daga mũminai!"

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, bã su kasance mũminai ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, Shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: The people of Noah denied the messengers
verses.hausa: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Nũhu, ya ce musu, "Shin, bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, zuwa gare ku, ni Manzo ne amintacce."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "To, ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãtã ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me."
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka, ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.english: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ashe, zã mu yi ĩmãni sabõda kai alhãli kuwa mafiya ƙasƙanci sun bi ka?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kuma bã ni da sani ga abin da suka kasance sanã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.
verses.hausa: "Hisãbinsu bai zama ba fãce ga Ubangijina, dã kunã sansancẽwa."

verses.english: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
verses.hausa: "Ban zama mai kõre mũminai ba."

verses.english: I am only a clear warner."
verses.hausa: "Nĩ ba kõwa ba ne sai mai gargaɗi mai bayyanãwa."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.english: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle ne, idan ba ka hanu ba, yã Nũhu, (daga maganarka,) haƙĩƙa, kanã kasancẽwa daga waɗanda ake jẽfewa"

verses.english: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijĩna! Lalle ne mutãnena sun ƙaryatã ni."

verses.arabic: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
verses.hausa: "Sai ka yi hukunci, a tsakãnĩna da tsakãninsu tabbataccen hukanci, kuma ka tsĩrar da ni, da waɗanda suke tãre da ni daga mũminai."

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.english: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka tsĩrar da shi, shi da waɗanda suke tãre da shi, a cikin jirgi wanda aka yi wa lõdi.

verses.english: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka nutsar a bãyan haka, da sauran.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma Lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai Rahama.

verses.english: 'Aad denied the messengers
verses.hausa: Ãdãwa sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Hũdu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne ni, zuwa gare ku, haƙĩƙa, Manzo ne, amintacce."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã ni tambayar wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba, fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

verses.english: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,
verses.hausa: "Shin, kunã yin ginin sitadiyo a kõwane tsauni ne, kunã yin wãsa?"

verses.english: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?
verses.hausa: "Kuma kunã riƙon matsãrar ruwa, tsammãninku, ku dawwama?"

verses.english: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
verses.hausa: "Kuma idan kun yi damƙa, sai ku yi damƙar kunã mãsu tanƙwasãwa."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "To ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.english: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
verses.hausa: "Ku ji tsõron wanda Ya taimake ku da abin da kuka sani."

verses.english: Provided you with grazing livestock and children
verses.hausa: "Ya taimake ku da dabbõbin ni'ima da ɗiya."

verses.english: And gardens and springs.
verses.hausa: "Da gõnaki da marẽmari."

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne nĩ, inã ji muku tsõron azãbar wani yini mai girma."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
verses.english: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Daidai ne a kanmu: Kã yi wa'azi kõ ba ka kasance daga mãsu wa'azi ba."

verses.english: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,
verses.hausa: "Wannan abu bai zamõ ba fãce hãlãyen mutãnen farko."

verses.english: And we are not to be punished."
verses.hausa: "Kuma mũ ba mu zama waɗanda ake yi wa azãba ba."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka suka ƙaryata shi, sai Muka halakar da sũ. Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: Thamud denied the messengers
verses.hausa: Samũdãwa sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu Sãlihu ya ce: "Shin, bã zã ku bi Allah da taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne nĩ zuwã gare ku, Manzo ne, amintacce."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba fãce da a Ubangijin halittu."

verses.english: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],
verses.hausa: "Shin, anã barin ku a cikin abin da yake a nan, kunã amintattu?"

verses.english: Within gardens and springs
verses.hausa: "A cikin gõnaki da marẽmari."

verses.english: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?
verses.hausa: "Da shuke-shuke da dabĩ nai, 'ya'yan itãcensu hirtsi mãsu narkẽwa a ciki?"

verses.english: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
verses.hausa: "Kuma kunã sassaƙa gidãje daga duwãtsu, kunã mãsu alfãhari?"

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.english: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
verses.hausa: "Kada ku yi ɗã'ã ga umurnin maɓarnata."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.english: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
verses.hausa: "Waɗanda suke yin ɓarna a cikin ƙasa, kuma bã su kyautatãwa."

verses.english: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Kai daga mãsu sihiri kurum kake."

verses.arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.hausa: "Bã kõwa kake ba, fãce mutum kamarmu. To, kã zo da wata ãyã idan kã kasance daga mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.english: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Wannan rãkuma ce tanã da shan yini, kuma kunã da shan yini sasanne."

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
verses.hausa: "Kada ku shãfe ta da cũta har azãbar yini mai girmã ta shãfe ku."

verses.english: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
verses.hausa: Sai suka sõke ta sa'an nan suka wãyi gari sunã mãsu nadãma.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka azãba ta kãma su. Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Ubangijinka, haƙĩ ƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwayi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: The people of Lot denied the messengers
verses.hausa: Mutãnen Lũɗu sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Lũɗu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne nĩ, zuwa gare ku, Manzõ ne, amintacce."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra, Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

verses.english: Do you approach males among the worlds
verses.hausa: "Shin kunã jẽ wa maza daga cikin talikai?"

verses.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.english: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
verses.hausa: "Kuma kunã barin abin da Ubangijinku Ya halitta muku daga mãtanku? Ã'a, ku mutãne ne mãsu ƙẽtarẽwa!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.english: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle ne haƙĩƙa idan ba ka hanu ba, yã Lũɗu! Tĩlas ne kanã kasancẽwa daga waɗanda ake fitarwa (daga gari)."

verses.english: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne ga aikinku, haƙĩƙa, inã daga mãsu ƙinsa."

verses.english: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
verses.hausa: "Ya Ubangijina! Ka tsĩrar da ni da iyãlĩna daga abin da suke aikatãwa."

verses.english: So We saved him and his family, all,
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka Muka tsĩrar da shi, Shi da mutãnensa gabã ɗaya.

verses.english: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
verses.hausa: Fãce wata tsõhuwa a cikin mãsu wanzuwa.

verses.english: Then We destroyed the others.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka darkãke wasu.

verses.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.english: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi ruwan sama a kansu ruwa, sai dai ruwan waɗanda ake yi wa gargaɗi ya mũnana.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne ga wannan, akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu bã su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
verses.hausa: Ma'abũta ƙunci sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da Shu'aibu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne ni, zuwa gare ku, Manzo ne, amintacce."

verses.english: So fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ba ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrata ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

verses.arabic: أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.english: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
verses.hausa: "Ku cika mũdu, kuma kada ku kasance daga mãsu sanyãwar hasãra (ga mutãne)."

verses.english: And weigh with an even balance.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku yi awo da sikẽli daidaitacce."

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.english: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
verses.hausa: "Kuma kada ku nakasa wa mutãne abũbuwansu kuma kada ku yi fasãdi a cikin ƙasa kuna mãsu ɓarna."

verses.english: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku ji tsõron Allah wanda Ya halitta ku, kũ da jama'ar farko."

verses.english: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Kai dai daga waɗanda suke sihirtattu kawai ne."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.english: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã kõwa kake ba, fãce mutum kamarmu kuma lalle ne munã zaton ka, haƙĩƙa, daga maƙaryata."

verses.arabic: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.hausa: "To ka jẽfo wani ɓaɓɓake daga sama a kanmu, idan ka kasance daga mãsu gaskiya."

verses.english: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ubangijĩna ne Mafi sani ga abin da kuke aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
verses.hausa: Sai suka ƙaiyatã shi, sabõda haka, azãbar rãnar girgije ta kãma su. Lalle ne ita, tã kasance azãbar yini mai girma.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle a cikin wancan haƙĩka akwai ãya, amma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Ubangijĩnka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle shi (Alƙur'ãni), haƙĩƙa, saukarwar Ubangijinhalittu ne.

verses.english: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
verses.hausa: Rũhi amintacce ne ya sauka da shi.

verses.english: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
verses.hausa: A kan zũciyarka, dõmin ka kasance daga mãsu gargaɗi.

verses.english: In a clear Arabic language.
verses.hausa: Da harshe na Larabci mai bayãni.

verses.english: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle shin, haƙĩƙa, yanã a cikin litattafan (Manzannin) farko.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.english: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
verses.hausa: Ashe, bai kasance ãyã ba a gare su, ya zama Mãlaman Banĩ Isrã'ĩla sun san shi?

verses.english: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
verses.hausa: Kuma dã mun saukar da shi a kan sãshen Ajamãwa,

verses.arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
verses.hausa: Ya karanta shi a kansu, ba su kasance sabõda shi mãsu ĩmãni ba.

verses.english: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
verses.hausa: Kamar wancan ne! Muka shigar da shi a cikin zukãtan mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.english: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Bã zã su yi ĩmãni da shĩ ba sai sun ga azãbar nan mai raɗadi.

verses.english: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
verses.hausa: Sai ta taho musu kwatsam, alhãli kuwa sũ, ba su sansance ba.

verses.english: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
verses.hausa: Sai su ce: "Shin, mu waɗanda ake yi wa jinkiri ne?"

verses.english: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
verses.hausa: Ashe, to, da azãbarMu suke nẽman gaggãwa?

verses.english: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
verses.hausa: Ashe, to, kã gani, idan Muka jĩshe su daɗi a shẽkaru,

verses.english: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan abin da suka kasance anã yi musu wa'adi (da shi) ya jẽ musu,

verses.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.english: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
verses.hausa: Abin da suka kasance anã jĩshe su dãɗin bã zai tunkuɗe azãba ba daga gare su.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.english: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
verses.hausa: Kuma bã Mu halakar da wata alƙarya ba fãce tanã da mãsu gargaɗi.

verses.english: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
verses.hausa: Dõmin tunãtarwa, kuma ba Mu kasance Mãsu zãlunci ba.

verses.english: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
verses.hausa: Kuma (Alƙur'ãni) Shaiɗãnu ba su ɗõra sauka da shĩba.

verses.english: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã ya kamãta a gare su (su Shaiɗãnu su sauka da shi), kuma ba su iyãwa.

verses.english: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne sũ, daga saurãre, haƙĩƙa, waɗanda aka nĩsantar ne.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.english: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, kada ka kira wani abin bautãwa na dabam tãre da Allah, sai ka kasance daga waɗanda ake yi wa azãba.

verses.english: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka yi gargaɗi ga danginka mafiya kusanci.

verses.arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka sassauta fikãfikanka ga wanda ya bĩ ka daga mũminai.

verses.arabic: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan suka sãɓã maka to ka ce: "Lalle nĩ, barrantacce ne daga abin da kuko aikatãwa."

verses.english: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
verses.hausa: Kuma ka dõgara ga Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.english: Who sees you when you arise
verses.hausa: Wanda Yake ganin ka a lõkacin da kake tãshi tsaye.

verses.english: And your movement among those who prostrate.
verses.hausa: Da jujjuyãwarka a cikin mãsu yin sujada.

verses.english: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.hausa: Lalle Shi, Shi ne Mai ji, Masani.

verses.arabic: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.english: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
verses.hausa: Shin, (kunã so) in gaya muku a kan wanda Shaiɗãnnu kan sauka?

verses.english: They descend upon every sinful liar.
verses.hausa: Sukan sauka a kan dukkan maƙaryaci, mai zunubi.

verses.english: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
verses.hausa: Sunã jẽfa (abin da suka) ji, alhãli kuwa mafi yawansu maƙaryata ne.

verses.english: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
verses.hausa: Kuma mawãƙa halakakku ne ke bin su.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.english: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
verses.hausa: Shin, ba ku cẽwa, lalle ne sũ, cikin kõwane rango sunã yin ɗimuwa (su ƙẽtare haddi) ba?

verses.english: And that they say what they do not do? -
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, sũ, sunã faɗin abin da bã su aikatãwa?

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.english: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
verses.hausa: Fãce waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, kuma suka ambaci Allah da yawa, kuma suka rãma zãlunci, daga bãyan an zãlunce su. Kuma waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, zã su sani a wace majũya suke jũyãwa.
